confirmReload.message: This extension requires you to reload tabs after install. Could you reload the current tab now?

welcomeMessage.message: Welcome! Please open a page in a new tab, and click the Gyazo button!

contextMenuSettingLabel.message: Always show Gyazo in context menu

pasteSupportSettingLabel.message: Replace Gyazo's URL to markdown style when it's pasted.

fileSizeLimitLabel.message: Upper limit file size to upload

fileSizeLimitHelpText.message: file whose size is larger will be compressed

pageScrollDelayHelpText.message: Please set slow if capture is broken
